alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Marathon; Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 7:45PM CDT until July 27 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MARATHON...SOUTHWESTERN LANGLADE AND WESTERN SHAWANO COUNTIES... At 745 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation to near Antigo to 10 miles west of Neopit to 6 miles north of Wittenberg, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Marathon, southwestern Langlade and western Shawano Counties, including the following locations... Bryant, Aniwa, Glandon, Elmhurst, Ackley Wildlife Area, Mattoon, Polar, Phlox, Kempster and Neva. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
